mapper.sql: clientele_id, clientele_num, clientele_name, category_id, corporation_time,legal_person, leader, email, phone, mobilephone, abbreviation, certificate_num, level, address, user_id, status, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time,remark
mapper.select:
select cli.clientele_id, cli.clientele_num, cli.clientele_name, cli.corporation_time,cli.legal_person, cli.leader, cli.email, cli.phone, cli.mobilephone, cli.abbreviation, cli.certificate_num, cli.level, cli.address, cli.status, cli.del_flag, cli.create_by, cli.create_time, cli.update_by, cli.update_time, cli.remark, cat.category_id,cat.category_num,cat.category_name, u.user_id,u.user_num,u.nickname, d.dept_id,d.dept_num,d.dept_name from sys_clientele cli left join sys_category cat on cat.category_id=cli.category_id and cat.category='1' left join sys_user u on u.user_id=cli.user_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id=u.dept_id
cli.clientele_num like concat(concat('%',#{cli.clienteleNum}),'%')
or cli.clientele_name like concat(concat('%',#{cli.clienteleName}),'%')
and cli.status = #{cli.status} and cli.user_id = #{cli.userId} and cli.category_id = #{cli.categoryId} and cli.del_flag='0'
order by cli.create_time desc

select cli.clientele_id, cli.clientele_num, cli.clientele_name, cli.corporation_time,cli.legal_person, cli.leader, cli.email, cli.phone, cli.mobilephone, cli.abbreviation, cli.certificate_num, cli.level, cli.address, cli.status, cli.remark, cat.category_id,cat.category_num,cat.category_name, u.user_id,u.user_num,u.nickname, d.dept_id,d.dept_num,d.dept_name from sys_clientele cli left join sys_category cat on cat.category_id=cli.category_id and cat.category='1' left join sys_user u on u.user_id=cli.user_id left join sys_dept d on d.dept_id=u.dept_id where cli.clientele_id = #{clienteleId}
